Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\console\controllers\CacheController

All Classes | Properties | Methods | Events
Inheritanceyii\console\controllers\CacheController » yii\console\Controller » yii\base\Controller » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable, yii\base\ViewContextInterface
Available since version2.0
Source Code
This command allows you to flush cache.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$id string The ID of this controller yii\base\Controller
$module yii\base\Module The module that this controller belongs to yii\base\Controller
$defaultAction string The ID of the action that is used when the action ID is not specified in the request yii\base\Controller
$layout string|boolean The name of the layout to be applied to this controller's views yii\base\Controller
$action yii\base\Action The action that is currently being executed yii\base\Controller
$interactive boolean Whether to run the command interactively yii\console\Controller
$color boolean Whether to enable ANSI color in the output yii\console\Controller
$behaviors yii\base\Behavior[] list of behaviors attached to this component yii\console\controllers\CacheController
$uniqueId string the controller ID that is prefixed with the module ID (if any) yii\console\controllers\CacheController
$route string the route (module ID, controller ID and action ID) of the current request yii\console\controllers\CacheController
$view yii\base\View the view object that can be used to render views or view files yii\console\controllers\CacheController
$viewPath string the directory containing the view files for this controller yii\console\controllers\CacheController

void actionFlush( $component = 'cache' )
